about_the_game:
Welcome to Saikuru,
The cycle you are about to go through and leave.

About the game

Saikuru is a small walking simulator inspired by Japanese culture and architecture. You need to be attentive, observing for any changes that may cause deviations in the cycle.

Rules


Rule 1
If you find any deviations, go right

Rule 2
If there are no deviations, go left

Rule 3
Complete 10 cycles

Types of deviations

  • External deviations
    (changes in the surrounding environment)
  • Hostile deviations
    (deviations with the aim of capturing or killing you)
  • Meteorological deviations
    (changes in weather)

Game duration

20-60 minutes

name: Saikuru

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7, 8, 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 740
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR enabled devices
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7, 8, 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR enabled devices

short_description: Welcome to Saikuru. Observe the environment and choose the right path to complete the cycle.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Traditional Chinese
